name: Nocturnal Sense
prereq: Acute Scent Or Precise Or Imprecise Scent And Low-light Vision
summary: Your senses gain even greater clarity.
description:
Your senses gain even greater clarity. While raging, you gain darkvision if you don't already have it, and the range of your imprecise scent increases to 60 feet.Traits

Rage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
